channel.title: Alch didn't heal
channel.description:
#### What happened? well I was alch and healed king and apparently he was never healed and it didnt prompt me that the heal was a success or failure, or that i was occupied or anything.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The heal should of worked and it should of prompted me with something
#### Steps to reproduce: seemingly the only thing that happened was me healing the king while the king sent guards to protect me
#### Comments: here's an image of what the prompts looked like https://i.imgur.com/DesIqkr.jpg

item.title: Alch didn't heal
item.dc:creator: Satan
item.description:
He wasn’t reaped he voted me off the next day because i didn’t heal him(he was poisoned).

Read full topic

item.title: Alch didn't heal
item.dc:creator: Satan
item.description:
What happened?

well I was alch and healed king and apparently he was never healed and it didnt prompt me that the heal was a success or failure, or that i was occupied or anything.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The heal should of worked and it should of prompted me with something

Steps to reproduce:

seemingly the only thing that happened was me healing the king while the king sent guards to protect me

Comments:

here’s an image of what the prompts looked like
https://i.imgur.com/DesIqkr.jpg
